response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute immensely to your success. This product, valued at $1,500,000 to me, holds immense potential for you, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000, representing a 6.7% discount on its full value.

This exceptional offer is valid for a limited time only, and I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of efficiency, productivity, and profitability for your organization.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details of the product, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
